name: Jaxon
description:
Hello!

In Jaxon, you play AS Jaxon. If it wasn't obvious enough. (Jaxon is pronounced as "Jackson")

Jaxon is a 2D Platformer game where your gun runs on money, so it is crucial to be conservative with your shots and collect enough coins to make sure you do not run out of ammo to shoot with.

The gist of the story is that you are Jaxon, a professional secret service agent in a futuristic neon city. You have been given a Rent-A-Gun, which costs $5 to shoot a bullet, and a mission to defeat the haywire androids that have been roaming the streets.

Some "legitimate" ratings from "legitimate" reviewers

"10/10, one of the best" - Reputable gaming reviewer    

     

"9/10, inspired a generation" - Reputable gaming reviewer #2             

                                         

"9.5/10, truly a masterpiece" - Reputable gaming reviewer #3
